phrases: I've been struggling with my depression, a bit more just because we've been trapped really inside and remotely over the past year.
The medication has helped me in the past, and maybe just increasing the dose might help me through this patch.
Chronic back pain that we've been dealing with... bothers me when I sit for long periods at my desk at work.
A little bit of numbing, but nothing tingling or hurting down my legs.
Symptoms improve when I stand up or change position.
Had a congenital artery when I was a baby... CABG... heart's been doing, doing, and arteries have been looking good.
Increase Prozac from 20 mg to 40 mg once daily.
3 out of 6 systolic ejection murmur, stable
Pain to palpation of the lumbar spine... decreased flexion of the back
Order an echocardiogram... continue aspirin 81 mg daily
Denies any edema or weakness in legs
Echocardiogram and lumbar spine x-ray results stable from last year
Prefers physical therapy over pain medication for back pain
